act: GUYANA NATIONAL SERVICE (PENSIONS AND  GRATUITIES) ACT

type.name: section
type.title: Short title.
type.context: GUYANA NATIONAL SERVICE (PENSIONS AND  GRATUITIES) ACT under Short title. 1. This Act may be cited as the Guyana National Service (Pensions and Gratuities) Act.
type.description: This Act may be cited as the Guyana National Service (Pensions and Gratuities) Act.

act: GUYANA NATIONAL SERVICE (PENSIONS AND  GRATUITIES) ACT

type.name: section
type.title: Interpretation.
type.context: GUYANA NATIONAL SERVICE (PENSIONS AND  GRATUITIES) ACT under Interpretation. 2. In this Act Guyana National Service has the same meaning as in section 2 of the Representation of the People Act.
type.description: In this Act Guyana National Service has the same meaning as in section 2 of the Representation of the People Act.
